name: SNAKE (ahmedSamyAlkhouly)
description:
The classic snake game with a lot of new  functionality.

The game made in 3D,

I made another version for mobile witch control with the touches   

If you interesting tell me in the comment section

The game difficulty increase over time base on the player score and his avoiding   ability   

 

Controls

Use the aero keys to control the snake and collect food and avoid touching the pumps and walls
